page.title: 18ADULT INTERESTS-IRONBRIDGE.
page.content: {Adult interest survey-Coalbrookdale & {Ironbridge C of E Primary School. One of the most popular interests for adults was sport.Our survey showed that many parents took part in some sort of sport.The four most supported sports were swimming,squash,jogging and tennis.Keepfit classes are also popular. Parents are interested in caring for the environment of this area as in membership of the Shropshire Trust for Nature Conservation.The most popular interest is the Friends of Ironbridge Gorge Museums Trust.Their second concern is for people as in membership of playgroup committee or a BMA (British Medical Association)group. Several parents are on the local P.C.C.(Parochial Church Council)
